definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: At last, some suggestions to the using and fabricating of zone plate are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 由此對線波帶片的使用及製造提出了建議。
